Dialog.A message that everyone can see when cli: A message that everyone can see when clicking on your username (max. 280 characters). You can use markdown to embed links.
Dialog.Show the home screen leaderboard (only w: Show the home screen leaderboard (only works with Anki 2.1.20+)
Dialog.Maximum number of users on the home scre: Maximum number of users on the home screen Leaderboard:
Dialog.Sync when deck is finished (only works w: Sync when deck is finished (only works with Anki 2.1.20+)
Dialog.Show league medals next to username: Show league medals next to username
Dialog.If it's a private group, please enter th: If it's a private group, please enter the password:
Dialog.Select a group you're an admin of: Select a group you're an admin of
Dialog.leave empty if it's currently not passwo: leave empty if it's currently not password protected
Dialog.Please explain why you want to report [u: Please explain why you want to report [user]:

how_to_use_tr.This add-on ranks all of its users by th: This add-on ranks all of its users by the number of cards reviewed today, time spend studying today, current streak, reviews in the past 31 days, and retention.
how_to_use_tr.You can also compete against friends, jo: You can also compete against friends, join groups, and join a country leaderboard.
how_to_use_tr.You'll only see users, that synced on th: You'll only see users, that synced on the same day as you.
how_to_use_tr.In the league tab, you see everyone who: In the league tab, you see everyone who synced at least once during the current season. There are four leagues (Alpha, Beta, Gamma, and Delta).
how_to_use_tr.A season lasts two weeks. You don't have: A season lasts two weeks. You don't have to sync every day.
how_to_use_tr.By default, there are public groups for: By default, there are public groups for Medicine, Language, and Pokemon.(pass 1234)
how_to_use_tr.If you want to delete the group, please: If you want to delete the group, please contact me.
how_to_use_tr.XP = days studied percentage x ((6 x tim: XP = days studied percentage x ((6 x time) + (2 x reviews x retention))
how_to_use_tr.You have to study at least 5 minutes per: You have to study at least 5 minutes per day. Otherwise, this day won't be counted as “studied” (See this issue for more info).
how_to_use_tr.At the end of each season, the top 20% w: At the end of each season, the top 20% will be promoted, and the last 20% will be relegated.
how_to_use_tr.You can check the leaderboard (past 24 h: You can check the leaderboard (past 24 hours) on this website.
